name: Full Body Blast
description: A complete full-body workout targeting all major muscle groups

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet together, jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Keep body straight, lower chest to ground, push back up

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.instructions: Feet shoulder-width apart, lower hips back and down, keep chest up

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body straight in push-up position, engage core

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward, lower back knee toward ground, alternate legs

name: Core Crusher
description: Intense ab workout to build core strength and definition

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, hands behind head, lift shoulders off ground

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.instructions: Alternate bringing opposite elbow to knee in cycling motion

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, twist torso side to side

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, raise legs to 90 degrees, lower slowly without touching ground

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly

name: Upper Body Power
description: Build strength in chest, shoulders, and arms

exercises.name: Diamond Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Hands close together forming diamond shape, focus on triceps

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Use chair or bench, lower body by bending elbows

exercises.name: Pike Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Hips high in air, lower head toward ground, targets shoulders

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.instructions: Arms extended, make small circles, gradually increase size

exercises.name: Plank to Push-up
exercises.instructions: Start in plank, push up to hands, return to elbows

name: Leg Day Burner
description: Intense lower body workout for strong, toned legs

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.instructions: Squat down, explode up into a jump, land softly

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
exercises.instructions: Back foot elevated, lower into lunge position

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Rise up on toes, hold briefly, lower slowly

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Back against wall, slide down to 90-degree angle, hold

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift hips up, squeeze glutes at top

name: Morning Yoga Flow
description: Gentle yoga flow to energize your morning

exercises.name: Sun Salutation
exercises.instructions: Flow through mountain, forward fold, plank, cobra, downward dog

exercises.name: Warrior II
exercises.instructions: Wide stance, front knee bent, arms extended, gaze over front hand

exercises.name: Tree Pose
exercises.instructions: Balance on one leg, other foot on inner thigh, hands in prayer

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.instructions: Knees wide, sit back on heels, arms extended forward

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, alternate arching and rounding spine

name: Six Pack Abs
description: Quick but effective ab workout for visible results

exercises.name: Plank Hold
exercises.instructions: Maintain straight body position, engage entire core

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Balance on one forearm and side of foot, keep hips elevated

exercises.name: Flutter Kicks
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, alternate kicking legs up and down

exercises.name: V-Ups
exercises.instructions: Lie flat, simultaneously raise legs and torso to form V shape

name: Quick Cardio Blast
description: Fast-paced cardio to get your heart pumping

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.instructions: Run in place, bring knees up to waist height

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.instructions: Squat, jump back to plank, push-up, jump forward, jump up

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.instructions: Classic jumping jack movement

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.instructions: Run in place, kick heels up to touch glutes

name: Chest Builder
description: Focus on chest development and upper body strength

exercises.name: Wide Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Hands wider than shoulders, focus on chest stretch

exercises.name: Decline Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Feet elevated on chair or bench, increases difficulty

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.instructions: Lean forward during dips to target chest

exercises.name: Push-up Hold
exercises.instructions: Hold at bottom of push-up position

name: Flexibility & Stretch
description: Improve flexibility and reduce muscle tension

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.instructions: Sit with one leg extended, reach toward toes

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
exercises.instructions: Lunge position, push hips forward gently

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.instructions: Pull arm across chest, hold with other arm

exercises.name: Spinal Twist
exercises.instructions: Seated, twist torso to one side, hold

name: Leg Toning
description: Sculpt and tone your legs with targeted exercises

exercises.name: Side Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step to side, bend knee, keep other leg straight

exercises.name: Single Leg Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Balance on one leg, hinge at hip, reach down

exercises.name: Sumo Squats
exercises.instructions: Wide stance, toes pointed out, squat down

exercises.name: Donkey Kicks
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, kick leg back and up
